message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate it!  However, I'm looking to spend closer to $11,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to spend closer to $11,000, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,500. What do you think?
